text.p: The average yield at the latest auction of three-month discount treasury bills jumped to 42.25 percent from 30.19 percent at the last sale on October 29, a central bank statement said on Wednesday.
Amount sold 2.22 million UAH 1.67 million UAH
Actual amount raised 2.01 million UAH 1.58 million UAH
The central bank sold 22,203 T-bills, the bank's statement said.
The date of the next auction of three-month discount T-bills is scheduled for November 14.
The average yield at the latest auction of six-month discount treasury bills rose to 49.01 percent from 48.58 percent at the last sale on November 5, a central bank statement said on Wednesday.
The results of Tuesday's auction, compared to the last issue of six-month discount T-bills, were as follows:
Amount sold 4.18 million UAH 6.49 million UAH
Actual amount raised 3.36 million UAH 5.22 million UAH
The central bank sold 41,790 T-bills, the bank's statement said.
The date of the next auction of six-month discount T-bills is scheduled for November 14.
The average yield at the latest auction of nine-month discount treasury bills slipped to 58.18 from 58.26 percent at the last sale on November 5, a central bank statement said.
The results of Tuesday's auction, compared to the last issue of nine-month discount T-bills, were as follows:
Amount sold 1.77 million UAH 11.44 million UAH
Actual amount raised 1.23 million UAH 7.97 million UAH
The central bank sold 17,635 T-bills, the bank's statement said.
The date of the next auction of nine-month discount T-bills is scheduled for November 14.
The auction of 12-month discount treasury bills scheduled for November 12 was cancelled without explanation, a central bank statement said. --Kiev newsroom +380 44 229-2264
